mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BNO, SUBJECT, CATEGORY, AUTHOR, CONTENT, READCOUNT, WRITEDATE, REPLYCOUNT, lag(bno,1) over(order by bno desc) as prev_bno, lead(bno,1) over(order by bno desc) as next_bno FROM BOARD ) WHERE BNO=#{bno}
SELECT * FROM TBl_BANNER WHERE BANNER_STATUS = 1 AND AREA = #{area} ORDER BY BNO DESC
